title: Expand Create Investment Form with E-Project, Payment Mode, Transaction IDs, and Payment Notice

requirements.summary: Add e-project dropdown field to InvestmentForm after Description field, populated with all 38 secoinfi-apps options, required and visible to all users
acceptanceCriteria: E-project dropdown appears after Description field in InvestmentForm
Dropdown contains all 38 secoinfi-apps options
Field is visible to all users (admin and investor roles)
Field is required for form submission

file_operations.description: Add e-project dropdown field positioned after the Description field. Use the existing 37 e-project options from the admin dropdown plus one additional option to reach 38 total secoinfi-apps options. Make the field required and visible to all users (remove admin-only restriction for this field). Ensure the dropdown state is captured and included in the createInvestment mutation call.

requirements.summary: Add Mode select dropdown with exactly four options (GPay, Crypto, CBDC, Wallets) after e-project field, required and visible to all users
acceptanceCriteria: Mode dropdown appears after e-project field
Dropdown contains exactly: GPay, Crypto, CBDC, Wallets
Field is required for form submission
Field is visible to all users

file_operations.description: Add a Mode select dropdown positioned after the e-project dropdown field. The dropdown must contain exactly four options: 'GPay', 'Crypto', 'CBDC', and 'Wallets'. Make the field required and ensure it is visible to all users. Capture the selected mode value and include it in the createInvestment mutation call.

requirements.summary: Add two transaction ID input fields after Mode dropdown: Txn ID (Nat) as required numeric field and Txn ID (String) as optional text field, visible to all users
acceptanceCriteria: Txn ID (Nat) field accepts only numeric input
Txn ID (Nat) is required
Txn ID (String) field accepts text input
Txn ID (String) is optional
Both fields are visible to all users

file_operations.description: Add two transaction ID input fields positioned after the Mode dropdown: (1) 'Txn ID (Nat)' as a required numeric input field that accepts only natural numbers (use type='number' with min='0' and step='1'), and (2) 'Txn ID (String)' as an optional text input field. Ensure both fields are visible to all users. Convert the Nat value to BigInt when calling createInvestment, and pass the string value as-is or null if empty.

requirements.summary: Add payment notice section after transaction ID fields displaying UPI ID, WhatsApp link, and Ethereum address in an informational box visible to all users
acceptanceCriteria: Notice displays UPI ID: secoin@uboi
Notice includes clickable WhatsApp link to +91 96200 58644
Notice displays Ethereum address: 0x4a100E184ac1f17491Fbbcf549CeBfB676694eF7
Notice is styled as an informational box
Notice is visible to all users

file_operations.description: Add a payment notice section positioned after the transaction ID fields. Display the following information in an informational notice box: UPI ID 'secoin@uboi', a clickable WhatsApp contact link 'https://wa.me/919620058644', and Ethereum address '0x4a100E184ac1f17491Fbbcf549CeBfB676694eF7'. Use a Card or Alert component from shadcn/ui to style the notice box with appropriate info styling (e.g., blue/info variant). Ensure the notice is visible to all users.

requirements.summary: Ensure expanded InvestmentForm with all new fields is visible and accessible to all authenticated users in Dashboard, removing any admin-only restrictions on form visibility
acceptanceCriteria: InvestmentForm is visible on Dashboard for all authenticated users
No admin-only conditional rendering wraps the form
Form remains in its current position in the Dashboard
All new fields are accessible to investor and admin roles

file_operations.description: Review and remove any admin-only conditional rendering that wraps the InvestmentForm component. Ensure the form is visible to all authenticated users (both admin and investor roles). The form should remain in its current position within the Dashboard layout. If there is currently role-based visibility logic, remove or adjust it so that all authenticated users can see and interact with the expanded InvestmentForm.
